tool_description: Detects and classifies file patterns in projects to identify file types, organizational structures, and suggest improvements for better project organization.

scan_path.description: Directory path to scan for file patterns

min_occurrences.description: Minimum occurrences to consider a pattern significant

error_messages: Scan path not found: The specified scan_path does not exist or is not accessible
Invalid pattern types: Use combinations of [extension, naming, size, location]
Invalid min_occurrences: Value must be greater than 0
usage: Provide scan_path to analyze. Optionally specify pattern_types array and min_occurrences threshold. Returns detected patterns and organization suggestions.

pattern_confidence.description: Confidence scores for each detected pattern

organization_suggestions.description: Suggested organizational improvements based on patterns

anomalies.description: Files that don't fit detected patterns
